name: Grab a Crab
description:
Our little crab puzzler takes you to a journey of weight and strength!
Let your crab grab the legs of another and so you get a large grabed crab line.
And watch the Fisherman pull out his empty net, poor guy.

Each crab has to be placed carfully. Who can place the most?
Who kann crack the score?

Every kind of crab has they´re own specifics, explore them all!
Join a magical underwaterworld with selfmade sounds, music and graphics.

This Team is family - not just in mind, also in every day life. 
And as a family we stand together and can find a solution to any problem. 
For example at our very first (weekly) gamesjam at week 162 ...
